title: Child, Hold Me
description: If you are looking for a compelling and heart-warming story, this book is for you!“Child, Hold Me,” is a short memoir about losing a child in the womb, told through a man’s eyes.Michel and Heather were a young college couple when she suddenly broke the news to him: She was pregnant. In this memoir, Michel explores the complex emotions of facing the reality of pregnancy. As he battles between the options of fathering a child, settling for adoption or even commiting abortion, Heather suddenly loses the child. While he mourns for the loss of his baby, a new conflict rises: His own sister is pregnant. Michel must now find the courage to abandon his guilt and put behind his bitterness.
author: Michel Sauret
